Sinopse
Em 1943 os nazistas decidem transferir os prisioneiros de guerra militares, que t&ecirc;m maior incid&ecirc;ncia em tentativas de fugas, para o mesmo campo, que foi projetado para impedir qualquer tipo de evas&atilde;o. Mas isto foi um erro, pois apesar dos prisioneiros gozarem de certos privil&eacute;gios, cada um era o melhor na sua "especialidade" e n&atilde;o pretendiam ficar presos at&eacute; o final da guerra. Logo idealizam um audacioso plano de fuga, que previa a constru&ccedil;&atilde;o de tr&ecirc;s t&uacute;neis, mas a id&eacute;ia n&atilde;o era retirar do campo alguns prisioneiros mas sim duzentos e cinq&uuml;enta. "Big X" Bartlett (Richard Attenborough) &eacute; um soldado brit&acirc;nico que habilmente elabora todo o plano. Ele &eacute; auxiliado por Danny Willinski (Charles Bronson), um polon&ecirc;s que &eacute; especialista em fazer trincheiras. H&aacute; tamb&eacute;m dois americanos: Hendley (James Marsden), que tem talento para roubar, e Hilts (Steve McQueen), que tem um jeito rebelde, al&eacute;m de ter id&eacute;ias pr&oacute;prias de como fugir e ser um recordista na tentativa de fugas. H&aacute; ainda Blythe (Donald Pleasence), um mestre na falsifica&ccedil;&atilde;o. A id&eacute;ia de fazerem tr&ecirc;s t&uacute;neis &eacute; que se um deles for descoberto os outros ainda servir&atilde;o para a evas&atilde;o. Al&eacute;m da fuga propriamente dita h&aacute; um esquema para, ap&oacute;s sa&iacute;rem do campo, chegarem at&eacute; a Inglaterra ou qualquer outro pa&iacute;s neutro.

Synopsis:
In 1943 the nazistas decides to transfer the war prisoners military, who have greater incidence in attempts of escapes, for the same field, that was projected to hinder any type of evasion.  But this was an error, therefore despite the prisoners enjoying of certain privileges, each one age best in its "specialty" and they did not intend to be imprisoned until the end of the war.  Soon they idealize an audacious plan of escape, that foresaw the construction of three tunnels, but the idea was not to remove of the field some prisoners but yes two hundred and fifty.  "Big X" Bartlett (Richard Attenborough) is a British soldier who habilmente elaborates all the plan.  It is assisted by Danny Willinski (Charles Bronson), a Pole who is specialist in making trenches.  He also has two Americans:  Hendley (James Marsden), that he has talent to steal, and Hilts (Steve McQueen), that he has an rebellious skill, besides having proper ideas of as to run away and to be a recordista in the attempt of escapes.  He still has Blythe (Donald Pleasence), a master in the fake.  The idea to make three tunnels is that if one of them will be discovered the others still will serve for the evasion.  Beyond the escape properly said it has a project for, after to leave the field, to arrive until England or any another neutral country.
